WorkItem.ClosedComment: Out of Date, this was a Rawr2 issue
WorkItem.Description:
Using the Rawr.Enhance module, I get the attached error when selecting any "boss" in the Boss options panel.  This occurs when using a new file or a previous saved file.
Â 
To reproduce simply create a new enhance shaman, and go to the Option | Boss tab.  Under the boss drop-down, change it to any of the listed bosses.
